doc:
Pete Schrum https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pete_Schrum 0 Paul Richard (Pete) Schrum born Shrum (b. Canton, Ohio, 16 December 1934 – 17 February 2003) was an American actor. Schrum started play acting while attending Catholic school. He is most memorable for playing the shotgun-firing bartender Lloyd in Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991). He died from a heart attack on 17 February 2003, aged 68. Paul_Richard ( Pete ) Schrum born Shrum ( b._Canton , Ohio , 16_December_1934 – 17_February_2003 ) was an_American_actor . Schrum started play_acting while attending Catholic_school . He is most_memorable for playing the_shotgun-firing_bartender_Lloyd in Terminator_2 : Judgment_Day_(_1991_) . He died from a_heart_attack on 17_February_2003 , aged 68 .
